Class WorkflowStage.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.efs.activator.WorkflowStage.Builder
Enclosing class:
WorkflowStage
public static final class WorkflowStage.Builder extends Object
Provides ability to programmatically define a WorkflowStage instance. Requires definition of stage index (within its parent Workflow) and its child workflow steps.

A workflow stage builder instance is accessed via WorkflowStage.builder()

A builder may be used in combination with a loaded typesafe WorkflowStageConfig bean to create a workflow stage instance.

Author:
Charles W. Rapp
